item.title: Core Contradiction: High-Performance Hardware, Malware OS
item.description:
Summary: Core diagnostic: first-rate analytical hardware trapped in a nervous system stuck in persistent low-grade panic. The mind is both scalpel and contaminated instrument.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batches 5–6

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
